de.myreality.dev.chronos.scripting
Interface ScriptBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicScriptBuilder, JsScriptBuilder, LuaScriptBuilder, PythonScriptBuilder
public interface ScriptBuilder

This file is part of Chronos (Myreality Game Development Toolkit). Chronos is licenced under GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE (Version 3)

For more information visit http://dev.my-reality.de/chronos

A script builder creates default content for a specific script type like LUA, Javascript or Python.

Since:
0.4
Author:
Miguel Gonzalez
